title: ILocalCircularPatternFeatureData.IGetSkippedItemArray
description: Gets the list of skipped items in this circular component pattern feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of long values that represent the skipped items in the pattern VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
This is a 0-based array, so if you skipped the third feature and the fifth feature in the pattern, then:
Array[0] = 3
Array[1] = 5
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
